General.Name: Woory Industrial Co. Ltd
General.Description: Woory Industrial Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells automotive parts and components in South Korea and internationally. Its products include HVAC actuators, door actuator, PTC heaters, COD heater, coolant heater, power modules, control heads, clutch coils, coolant valve, resistors, power transistors, current sensors, parkin assist system, and electric parking brake. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Yongin, South Korea.
